about.subtitle: Copywriter & Content Creator
about.description1: Hello! I'm a 25-year-old marketing student with a passion for experimenting in the creative industry. I believe I have an excellent sense of aesthetics, which is why I pay attention to details in my projects.
about.description2: I really try to find beauty in everything that surrounds me. I love learning new things, which is why I'm not afraid of challenges.
about.description3: Additionally, I'm a cat mom in my private life, which you can see in the photo next to me ü•∞. I also love cooking, especially Italian cuisine specialties, and dancing.
